para: Add pixel groups to category definitions inside a µ data file. The groups argument is a Python list of strings, where each string is the name of a group belonging to the given category of pixel.

formalpara.title: Example
formalpara.para: The command OOF.LoadData.Microstructure.DefineCategory.PixelGroups( microstructure='tiny3', category=0, groups=['lawrence, 'talkingheads']) puts all pixels in category 0 in the µ named tiny3 into the pixel groups named lawrence and talkingheads.

para: This command is only used in data files.
